languages.text: {n}Старец скрипит зубами и поворачивается к молодому священнику.{/n} "Может, моя кровь и грязнее угля, но я ношу рясу не просто так!"
{n}The old man grits his teeth and turns to the young priest.{/n} "My blood may be fouler than coal, but at least I've earned my robes!"
languages.original_text: {n}Старец скрипит зубами и поворачивается к молодому священнику.{/n} "Может, моя кровь и грязнее угля, но я ношу рясу не просто так!"

{n}The old man grits his teeth and turns to the young priest.{/n} "My blood may be fouler than coal, but at least I've earned my robes!"

languages.text: {n}年迈的牧师咬紧牙关，转向年轻的牧师。{/n}“或许我的血确实比泥浆还要污浊，但至少，我的长袍是我靠自己的努力得来的！”
languages.original_text: {n}The old man grits his teeth and turns to the young priest.{/n} "My blood may be fouler than coal, but at least I've earned my robes!"

traits.locale_text: {n}年迈的牧师咬紧牙关，转向年轻的牧师。{/n}“或许我的血确实比泥浆还要污浊，但至少，我的长袍是我靠自己的努力得来的！”

languages.text: {n}老人は歯を食いしばり、若い司祭の方へと向き直った。{/n}「私の血が石炭よりも汚れていようとも、少なくともこの法衣は自らの力で手に入れたのです！」
languages.original_text: {n}The old man grits his teeth and turns to the young priest.{/n} "My blood may be fouler than coal, but at least I've earned my robes!"

traits.locale_text: {n}老人は歯を食いしばり、若い司祭の方へと向き直った。{/n}「私の血が石炭よりも汚れていようとも、少なくともこの法衣は自らの力で手に入れたのです！」

languages.text: {n}El anciano aprieta los dientes y se vuelve hacia el sacerdote joven.{/n} «Puede que mi sangre sea más sucia que el carbón, ¡pero al menos yo me he ganado el hábito!».
languages.original_text: {n}The old man grits his teeth and turns to the young priest.{/n} "My blood may be fouler than coal, but at least I've earned my robes!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano aprieta los dientes y se vuelve hacia el sacerdote joven.{/n} «Puede que mi sangre sea más sucia que el carbón, ¡pero al menos yo me he ganado el hábito!».

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar, dişlerini sıkıp genç rahibe dönüyor.{/n} "Kanım kömürden daha kirli olabilir ama en azından cübbemi hak ettim!"
languages.original_text: {n}The old man grits his teeth and turns to the young priest.{/n} "My blood may be fouler than coal, but at least I've earned my robes!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Büyük rahip, dişlerini sıkıp küçük rahibe dönüyor.{/n} "Kanım kömürden daha kirli olabilir ama en azından cübbemi hak ettim!"

languages.text: {n}Le vieil homme serre les dents et se tourne vers le jeune prêtre.{/n} « Mon sang est peut-être plus impur que le charbon, mais je mérite au moins la robe que je porte ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The old man grits his teeth and turns to the young priest.{/n} "My blood may be fouler than coal, but at least I've earned my robes!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil homme serre les dents et se tourne vers le jeune prêtre.{/n} « Mon sang est peut-être plus impur que le charbon, mais je mérite au moins la robe que je porte ! »

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann beißt die Zähne zusammen und wendet sich dem jungen Priester zu.{/n} "Mein Blut mag schwärzer sein als Kohle, aber wenigstens habe ich mir meine Robe verdient!"
languages.original_text: {n}The old man grits his teeth and turns to the young priest.{/n} "My blood may be fouler than coal, but at least I've earned my robes!"
